descriptionHtml:
[center][color=DarkGreen][size=7]Jii\'s Tower[/size][/color][/center] 
[line]
[center][color=DarkGreen][size=4]by amullinix[/size][/color][/center] 
[color=DarkGreen][size=3]Version             :[/size][/color]BETA .02
[color=DarkGreen][size=3]Date                :[/size][/color]01/13/2013
[color=DarkGreen][size=3]Category            :[/size][/color]Locations - New
[color=DarkGreen][size=3]Author\'s Website    :[/size][/color]http://www.forcedfableproductions.tumblr.com/
[color=DarkGreen][size=3]Forum Page           :[/size][/color]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1454813-amullinix/
[line] 
BE AWARE: I am a new modder. I have worked with previous construction kits for my own benefit, but never uploaded anything. My wife encouraged me to upload one of my creations, so I figured it couldnt hurt. I have already learned the need for player testing (other than myself) over the past couple of hours (after uploading). I should have everything fixed now. If there are any other issues, please comment and let me know. Again, your patience is more than appreciated.

-anthony
[line] 

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Modifies the Abandoned Ruins near Reachwind into a Dwemer Tower. Also adds a story element, and the beginning of an unscripted quest.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]This being my first mod, I wanted to do something simple. I\'m not a scripter, but fancy myself a writer. I\'m not a sculpter, but fancy myself artistic. Those two things are what I attempted to use in creating Jii\'s Tower. I wanted to find a way to add a new story, unscripted (more for immersion than because I can\'t script), to allow the player to feel like something actually happened, on its own, in that area. I wanted to make a story, with areas that are pleasing to the eye. With that, you get the first iteration of the story with Jii\'s Tower. I have full intention of adding \'chapters\' to this story, as it progresses.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Location[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Near Reachwind Eyrie. If you need to, fast travel to Reachwind Eyrie, and look to your right. Can\'t miss it![/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]History[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]BETA.01: initial upload[/center] 
[center]BETA.02: additional cliff piece removed from near the tower. not sure how it snuck in there, or how I didnt see it. uploaded new version.[/center]
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Known Issues and Bugs[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Only one that I know of, and it\'s only if you use a certain mod.
-The Cartographers Map Markers: This mod adds the \'Abandoned Ruins\' Marker to the same location. Since this is a new item (created by the Map Marker mod), placing Jii\'s Tower at the end of your load order will not fix it. Be patient with me, as I learn how to fix simple things like this. Thank you.

Report anything else you may see and I will do what I can to fix it A.S.A.P![/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Incompatibilities[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]None that I know of.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Message me through the Nexus forums, or comment in the mod thread![/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Credits[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]-Bethesda
-The Nexus
-The Modders[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Drag and drop \'JiisTower.esp\' into the Data folder of your main Skyrim directory (typically found in \"-installation location-\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\")[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Nexus Mod Manager Installation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Download manually and install using the \'+\' icon in NMM, or simply click \'Download with Installer\'. Simple! *recommended*[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Manual Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Simply remove/uncheck JiisTower from your Data folder/load order.[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url] 
[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on the steam network.
[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url] 
[/list] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Extra Tools Used[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Pyros Guidelines[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Mod Dependencies[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Required (other than Skyrim)
-Update.esm[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Future Plans[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Additional Chapters are expected in the future. The purpose is to create a reading atmosphere, that the player can enjoy throughout. At the same time, I wanted the player to be able to live in the story, and follow it as a sort of unscripted questline. Hopefully I can keep people interested long enough to see the end![/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Recommended Mods[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3222]Immersive HUD - iHUD[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288]Lush Grass[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3385]Lush Trees[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1192]High Quality Food and Ingredients[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15489]The Cartographers Map Markers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14513]Khajiit Speak - Complete Dialogue Overhaul[/url]
[/center] 
[line]

[u][center][size=5][color=DarkGreen]Legal and Licensing[/color][/size][/center][/u] 
[center]Before you use the content first contact me and ask for permission. I am not against someone else using what I put there, since it wasn\'t much. The only thing I will state is there is no use of the story elements. Those are mine, and will require asking first. Thanks![/center] 
[line]
[center][size=3][color=DarkGreen]ReadMe generated with: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22340]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url][/color][/size][/center] 
[line]
author: amullinix
